name: Overreach
description:
Created by Team Phlargenarffen for the 1 month 2017 Summer Awful Jam, the theme was "Bootlegs"

Development Note: All Art, Audio, and Code was created from scratch. 

Maximum Players: 4

This game supports both the keyboard/mouse and game pads. Only one player may use the keyboard/mouse at a time; the rest must use game pads.

Known working gamepads:

  • Xbox 360 / Xbox One
  • PS4
  • 8Bitdo game pad (in Xbox mode, likely also works in PS4 mode)

Other gamepads, particularly the typical two-joystick, four-face-button gamepads, should also work.

Known Issues:

  • There is currently no way to quit a running match. To speed things up, have everyone jump off the edges of the stage :V
  • The "Sound Stage" stage has some issues with characters spawning inside of the moving objects, causing them to fall through the stage to their deaths (or get stuck).
